messages.message:
@Jasper out of curiosity what do you use aihub.eu (http://aihub.eu) for?

I'm just thinking now that we support using LLM in refiner directly through sandboxes (that can be provisioned with Azure openAI keys and deployed in the EU), does it make sense to support aihub.eu (http://aihub.eu) in the long term? As I understand, we created this to support PoVs, so that sandboxes could call aihub.eu (http://aihub.eu) on the backend (prior to enabling services to be deployed in a sandbox).
